entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Milk River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.3°C

Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 16.
